text: The northern bat (Eptesicus nilssonii) is a species of bat in Eurasia.Rydell, J. (1993). Eptesicus nilssonii. Mammalian species, (430), 1-7. It is related to the serotine bat (Eptesicus serotinus).Mayer, F., & von Helversen, O. (2001). "Cryptic diversity in European bats". Proceedings of the Royal Society of London. Series B: Biological Sciences. 268 (1478): 1825â€“1832. == References == Category:Bats Category:Mammals of Europe Category:Mammals of Asia Category:Mammals of Japan
title: Northern bat
